mapper.insert: INSERT INTO league (id, name, english_name, season, seasonOffset, training_date) VALUES (#{league.id}, #{league.name}, #{league.englishName}, #{league.season}, #{league.seasonOffset}, #{league.trainingDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{league.name}, english_name = #{league.englishName}, season = #{league.season}, seasonOffset = #{league.seasonOffset}, training_date = #{league.trainingDate};
